data.__txt_text2:
After Campaign Goals:
- Become a demigod under the WW (Chaos (Protean)/Isolation)
- Bring in a new age of gods, chaos through diversity
- Work on bringing Apostle tech to the mainstream and merge science and magic
- Travel to an Apostle planet and discuss with them to...
-- Become the Zeurel and uphold the Mantle of Responsibility in the Sol system
data.__txt_Notes:
Halo Actions:
- Water causes stasis that slows movement speed (Possibly fortitude save)
- Vaporizes matter by accelerating to light speed
- Can give overshield to targets

- CAN'T create energy barrier


===========
== Norfang ==
===========
Rainbow Arrow Effects:
Colors: Red (fire), Orange, Yellow (electric), Green (acid), Blue (cold), Purple, Violet
Effects: Cycling colors (chaos), disintegrate on impact (destruction), arrowhead is crescent shaped (lunar)
